Ya I was running garage on interchange with a pistol for quests and scav kills and a bunch of the scavs had almost full backpacks full of loot.  Good stuff too! I made 900k that raid and I didnâ€™t loot anything but the scavs I killed lol

The biggest thing is the durability to
I farm raiders all the time. How I stockpile my 995, m63, bp etc and get free helmets and tier5 armors and meds and nades.  Before their guns were worthless to run.
